scripts.dev:setup: cd lib && npm i && npm run build && cd ../ && npm run docs:setup && npm run hacker-news:setup && npm run pong:setup
scripts.build:all: npm run lib:build && npm run docs:build && npm run pong:build && npm run hacker-news:build
scripts.docs:build: cd ./docs-src && npm run build && yes | cp -rf .docz/dist ../docs
scripts.hacker-news:build: cd ./examples/hacker-news && npm run build && yes | cp -rf ./build ../../docs/hacker-news
scripts.pong:build: cd ./examples/pong && npm run build && yes | cp -rf ./build ../../docs/pong
